existing_token_expire_in_seconds.description: The expiration time of the bearer token in ISO 8601 format. This will set the expiration_time of existing token only to a smaller timestamp, it cannot extend the expiration_time. Use 0 to expire the existing token immediately, negative number will return an error.

200.description: The recipient token was successfully rotated.

post.description: Refreshes the specified recipient's delta sharing authentication token with the provided token info. The caller must be the owner of the recipient.
